issue.title: microsoftstart.msn.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://microsoftstart.msn.com/en-ca/feed](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmicrosoftstart.msn.com%2Fen-ca%2Ffeed) ### Comment > This ad "card" is under an element called "cs-native-ad-card" with class type of "card-container".
